text: @realDonaldTrump US used disinformation of genetic sequence of the coronavirus to start developing vaccine on 11/01/2020, since then, U have always regarded Pandemic warning as hoaxes to make your own disinformations in killing American citizens and finding scapegoats for your shameful faults.
